name: Angel Town 8- idle RPG
description:
◆Don’t need internet!

◆ANGEL TOWN 8 is a new gameplay idle game,combining RPG and simulation.

【Features】
◆Different angels fight for you
◆Customize your team
◆Highly accessible TD gameplay
◆Original fantasy world
◆Control optimized for mobile devices
◆Colorful, vivid HD graphics and animations
◆Fight until you reach the top of the standings
◆Easy to learn – jump right in and play

【Master Your War Strategy】
◆Plan your tactics for the clash! Plan your troop lineups, perfect your strategyO(∩_∩)O

【Create The Powerful Angel Army】
◆Develop your strategy and make key moves in this epic RPG. Pick teammates with complementary abilities and go to war with enemies(⊙０⊙)

【Intense Battles】
◆Take part in strategic battles streamlined for on-the-go play with maps that fit in the palm of your hand! Lead your army with easy touch-and-drag controls, including the ability to attack by simply swiping an ally over an enemy(* ∩ _ ∩ *)

【Endless Fun】
◆Explore Dungeons,train angels, and more.Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours＼( ^▽^ )／

【More】
And..... more to come(＝^ω^＝)

—————— Questions————————
【Q】 How can I modify the commander's name?
【A】 In your iOS, 【Settings】 - > 【GameCenter】.

【Q】 The IAP did not reach my account,what can I do?
【A】Please wait patiently.If the IAP can't reach your account in 24 hours, please contact us by crabsoft@hotmail.com.

【Q】 Why can't I see the ranking information?
【A】 Please login in GameCenter

—————————Feedback—————————
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
